events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated.
The issue has been classified under delivery delays due to the keywords found in the customer description.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code so I can look into the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is ABCD1234XYZ.
Thank you for the details. It appears the package was delayed due to shipping carrier issues. We can expedite a new shipment or offer a full refund.
I would prefer the expedited reshipment, thanks for offering that solution quickly.
Your replacement order has been processed for express shipping and you will receive a new tracking number shortly.
Just following up to confirm you have received your replacement package. Please let us know if everything arrived as expected.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything is perfect. Thank you for the excellent support!
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime for assistance.
